QuestData.Title: Trial At The Temple of the White Tiger
QuestData.Description: Xuen, the great Celestial of the North, seeks the greatest champions in the land.$B$BToday, he holds trials of battle at his temple in Kun-Lai Summit.$B$BIf you wish to test yourself against skilled fighters from all across Pandaria, then go to him and enter the challenger's ring!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Xuen at the Temple of the White Tiger in Kun-Lai Summit.
